name.en: Literacy of learning and instructional technology

goal.ch:
本課程目標為協助師資培育中心學生建立教學與學習科技之概念與應用。故在本課程將探討，教學與學習科技的不同層面，如A1科技輔助自主學習概論、A2數位學習平臺應用、A3數位素養、B1科技輔助自主學習工作坊、B2 PBL教學應用工作坊、B3數位教學指引培力工作坊、B4各領域數位教學工作坊以及B5生成式AI融入教學工作坊。本課程預計達到「中央大學師資培育中心教育目標及核心能力」如能夠適當運用科技於教學中、以及應用多元教學策略、教學媒材及學習科技，以促進學生有效學習。
學習者將獲得以下知識及技能：
1.知識面：教學與學習科技的概念與應用。
2.態度面：對於教學與學習科技有正確的認識，能與他人合作與討論。
3.技能面：熟悉教學與學習科技相關技能。
goal.en:
The goal of this course is to assist students in the Teacher Education Center in developing concepts and applications of instructional and learning technologies. The course explores various aspects of instructional and learning technologies, including:

A1: Introduction to Technology-Assisted Self-Directed Learning
A2: Applications of Digital Learning Platforms
A3: Digital Literacy
B1: Workshop on Technology-Assisted Self-Directed Learning
B2: Workshop on PBL (Project-Based Learning) Teaching Applications
B3: Workshop on Empowering Digital Teaching Guidelines
B4: Workshops on Digital Teaching in Various Disciplines
B5: Workshop on Integrating Generative AI into Teaching
This course aligns with the “Educational Goals and Core Competencies“ of the National Central University Teacher Education Center, such as appropriately utilizing technology in teaching, applying diverse teaching strategies, instructional materials, and learning technologies to facilitate effective student learning.

Learners will acquire the following knowledge and skills:

Knowledge: Concepts and applications of instructional and learning technologies.
Attitude: A proper understanding of instructional and learning technologies, and the ability to collaborate and discuss with others.
Skills: Proficiency in skills related to instructional and learning technologies.
